source.8933093f:
# Zero week
In  [my previous notebooke](https://www.kaggle.com/ladanova/osic-pulmonary-fibrosis-progression-eda) I researched all weeks now I only want to research zero week.
Because there is a CT scan in week 0 competition.
source.a4a86370: # What does the data give us?
source.b8970d0d:
## Zero week 
Let's select the data of the zero week.
source.71ef6197: * There are 5 times more men than women.
source.398b6a81: * Men have a higher FVC than women and therefore a FVC of 100% will be higher.
source.84318a56: * Forced vital capacity is lowest in never smokers. Consequently, the percentage is also lower than the norm.
